      • opt

        public static boolean opt(java.util.Scanner sreader,
                          boolean choice,
                          double[] memory)
        This method defines the variable choice as true in case the user wants to make a flow of operations and defines it as false when the user wants to a new operation. In other hand, this method allow to show the memory array if the user wants. pre: It musth be inicialized the boolean variable choice post: The boolean variable choice will be true or false
        Parameters:
        sreader - Is the scanner that allow to read the option writed by the user.
        choice - Is the boolean that allow continue the operations or not.
        memory - is the Array where the results of the operations are stored.
        Returns:
        choice Is the result of the user's choice.

        nreader - the scanner allow the reading of the variable b written by the user.
